RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/SchemaTableDefaultFactory.java

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaTableDefaultFactoryJava
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasSuperClassRelation no implNewPKey default empty$$switch HasSuperClassRelation no implNewHPKey default empty$$iterate Index( each implNewNonPrimaryIndexKey )$$implNewBuff$$implNewHBuff$
